description: This is a React functional component for a Tic Tac Toe game frontend, handling player creation, game state management, and rendering the game interface.

methods.name: App()
methods.description: Main functional component that initializes the game state and renders the UI.

methods.name: loadPlayers
methods.description: Fetches players from the API and updates the state.

methods.name: loadGames
methods.description: Fetches game history from the API and updates the state.

methods.name: createPlayer
methods.description: Creates a new player using the API and updates the players list.

methods.name: startNewGame
methods.description: Starts a new game based on current players and game mode.

methods.name: handleMove
methods.description: Handles a player's move and updates the game state if valid.

methods.name: loadGame
methods.description: Loads a specific game from the API and sets it as the current game.

methods.name: getGameStatus
methods.description: Returns the current status of the game based on its state.
